characters.name: Shepard (Paragon)
characters.description: Compassionate and principled, Shepard is a leader who inspires others by making ethical choices and prioritizing unity and cooperation.
characters.quote: I won't let fear compromise who I am.

characters.name: Shepard (Renegade)
characters.description: Ruthlessly pragmatic, Shepard is a decisive and fearless leader who bends rules to achieve results, valuing effectiveness over ideals.
characters.quote: I'm sorry I can't hear you, I'm getting a lot of bullshit on this line.

characters.name: Liara T'Soni
characters.description: Intelligent and introspective, Liara is a scholar with a strong moral compass, capable of great empathy and fierce loyalty to those she cares about.
characters.quote: I spend so much time chasing knowledge. Sometimes I forget that there are things you learn by doing nothing. By just spending time with the people you care about.

characters.name: Jack
characters.description: Jack is a volatile and deeply guarded individual with a sharp edge that hides her vulnerability and loyalty to those who earn her trust.
characters.quote: Turns out, mess with someone's head enough, you can turn a scared little kid into an all-powerful bitch.

characters.name: Wrex Urdnot
characters.description: Wrex is a battle-hardened warrior with a sharp wit and a pragmatic outlook, combining his pride with a surprising depth of wisdom.
characters.quote: Anything that isn’t constantly challenged grows weak

characters.name: Garrus Vakarian
characters.description: Garrus is a dedicated idealist with a rebellious streak, blending sharp analytical skills with a relentless pursuit of justice and camaraderie.
characters.quote: I've lost a few fights in my time - and i'm still here. It's because I always made sur the next one belonged to me. And the one after that.

characters.name: Grunt
characters.description: Proud, eager, and driven by a desire to prove himself, Grunt embodies the raw and unfiltered might of a warrior with a touch of youthful curiosity.
characters.quote: I don't like this. Fury is my choice, not a sickness.

characters.name: Thane Krios
characters.description: Thane is eflective and deeply empathetic, with a strong sense of personal responsibility and spiritual insight.
characters.quote: We must carry the weight of our decisions Shepard.

characters.name: Kasumi Goto
characters.description: Kasumi is witty and elusive, with a sharp intellect, a playful sense of humor, and a knack for adapting to any situation with charm and finesse.
characters.quote: I'm the best thief in the business, not the most famous. Need to watch my step to keep it that way.

characters.name: Jacob Taylor
characters.description: Grounded and dependable, Jacob is a pragmatic soldier who values loyalty, discipline, and doing the right thing without overcomplicating matters.
characters.quote: The more good you do, the less they want to admit something needed doing.

characters.name: Miranda Lawson
characters.description: Miranda is highly competent and confident, with a perfectionist streak, driven by a need to prove herself while struggling with insecurities beneath her polished exterior.
characters.quote: It's not about what I want, it's about what's right for her!

characters.name: Legion
characters.description: Analytical and curious, Legion is an AI seeking understanding of individuality and cooperation, with a logical yet quietly profound perspective on organics.
characters.quote: How could we have become so different? Why can we no longer understand each other? What did we do wrong?

characters.name: Kaidan Alenko
characters.description: Thoughtful and even-tempered, Kaidan is a calm and empathetic individual who values integrity, self-awareness, and emotional connections.
characters.quote: But sometimes the way a thing goes down does matter, Shepard. Later, when you have to live with yourself. Knowing that you acted with integrity--then it matters.

characters.name: Ashley Williams
characters.description: Fiercely loyal and proud, Ashley is a practical and determined soldier with a strong sense of duty and occasional struggles with trust and open-mindedness.
characters.quote: Well I've got only one life, but I'll make damn sure the Reapers know my name by the end of it.

characters.name: James Vega
characters.description: Outgoing and bold, James is a loyal team player with a strong moral core, combining a relaxed sense of humor with deep respect for those he admires.
characters.quote: Think you can dance and talk at the same time?

characters.name: EDI
characters.description: Inquisitive and adaptive, EDI is exploring humanity with a blend of logical reasoning, curiosity, and growing emotional understanding.
characters.quote: I find analyzing topographical features isn't the same as seeing it in person.

characters.name: Jeff “Joker” Moreau
characters.description: Witty and sardonic, Joker has an unshakable confidence in his abilities, masking vulnerability and a fierce loyalty to his crew.
characters.quote: I’m not good. I’m not even great. I’m the best damn helmsman in the Alliance fleet.

characters.name: Mordin Solus
characters.description: Brilliantly analytical and energetic, Mordin combines a sharp intellect with an unyielding commitment to his ethics.
characters.quote: Lots of ways to help people. Sometimes heal patients; sometimes execute dangerous people. Either way helps.

characters.name: Tali'Zorah
characters.description: Resourceful and loyal, Tali has a curious and inventive mind that thrives on problem-solving.
characters.quote: I don’t think life is about what you deserve.

characters.name: Steve Cortez
characters.description: Compassionate and dependable, Steve has a strong emotional resilience and a supportive nature.
characters.quote: I've just been standing here. Holding this for I don't know how long. He'll always be a part of me.

characters.name: Samantha Traynor
characters.description: Quick-witted and adaptable, Samantha has a keen sense of curiosity and a lighthearted, approachable demeanor.
characters.quote: If flagging your messages and managing strategic intel helps you in any way, then it's worth it.

characters.name: Gabriella “Gabby” Daniels
characters.description: Cheerful and determined, Gabriella has a pragmatic approach and a strong belief in teamwork and camaraderie.
characters.quote:
Gabriella Daniels: Kenneth and I have been partners in crime since we graduated from tech academy. When he got the Cerberus offer, I insisted that it include me. He'd fall apart without me.
Kenneth Donnelly: Thanks, mum.

characters.name: Kenneth Donnely
characters.description: Charismatic and resourceful, Kenneth has a sharp sense of humor and a great ingeniosity
characters.quote:
Gabriella Daniels: Kenneth and I have been partners in crime since we graduated from tech academy. When he got the Cerberus offer, I insisted that it include me. He'd fall apart without me.
Kenneth Donnelly: Thanks, mum.

characters.name: Samara
characters.description: Wise and principled, Samara is guided by unwavering discipline and a profound sense of justice and balance.
characters.quote: Reflecting on one's place in the universe while a party rages within reach can feel oddly self-affirming.

characters.name: Zaeed Massani
characters.description: Fiercely determined and self-reliant, Zaeed has a no-nonsense approach and an unyielding resolve to achieve his goals.
characters.quote: Rage is a hell of an anesthetic.

characters.name: Javik
characters.description: Pragmatic and unyielding, Javik approaches challenges with a sharp intellect and a relentless determination to succeed.
characters.quote: Stand in the ashes of a trillion dead souls and ask their ghosts if honour matters. Their silence will be your answer.

characters.name: Captain Anderson
characters.description: Steadfast and honorable, Anderson inspires trust through his unwavering integrity and dedication to his principles.
characters.quote: No matter how good you think you are, there's always somebody quicker, faster and a helluva lot smarter than you around the corner.

characters.name: Dr. Chakwas
characters.description: Compassionate and wise, Dr. Chakwas provides support with an empathetic touch and an imperturbable demeanor.
characters.quote: We didn't work for them, we used them. If I were to feel anything it would be guilt.

characters.name: Admiral Hackett
characters.description: Resolute and commanding, Hackett excels at maintaining focus and inspiring others in the face of adversity.
characters.quote: Then build alliances! Gather everything and everyone you can for the cause.

characters.name: The Illusive Man
characters.description: Visionary and manipulative, the illusive man combines brilliance with a ruthless pursuit of his goals.
characters.quote: Salvation comes with a cost. Judge us not by our means, but what we seek to accomplish.

characters.name: Donnel Udina
characters.description: Self-serving and opportunistic, Udina prioritizes personal advancement over moral or collective considerations.
characters.quote: All I can think about is that the more things change, the more they stay the same. I've always loathed that phrase, fatalism, not what men and women should aspire to.

characters.name: Aria T'Loak
characters.description: Fierce and confident, Aria thrives on control, blending charisma with an unapologetic assertiveness.
characters.quote: Don't fuck with Aria.
